name: Customer Onboarding Automation
description: Streamline new customer onboarding with automated welcome emails, account setup, and task assignments

parameters.subject: Welcome to our service, {{$json["name"]}}!
parameters.message:
Hi {{$json["name"]}},

Welcome to our service! We're excited to have you on board.

Here's what happens next:
1. Account setup (within 24 hours)
2. Welcome call scheduling
3. Access to your dashboard

If you have any questions, don't hesitate to reach out.

Best regards,
The Team

setupInstructions.title: Configure Webhook URL
setupInstructions.description: Copy the webhook URL and configure it in your website or form system to trigger when new customers sign up.

setupInstructions.title: Setup CRM Integration
setupInstructions.description: Connect your HubSpot account or replace with your preferred CRM integration node.

setupInstructions.title: Configure Email Settings
setupInstructions.description: Set up your email credentials and customize the welcome email template.

setupInstructions.title: Setup Task Management
setupInstructions.description: Connect your Todoist account or replace with your preferred task management system.

setupInstructions.title: Configure Slack Notifications
setupInstructions.description: Connect your Slack workspace and set the appropriate channel for customer notifications.

setupInstructions.title: Test the Workflow
setupInstructions.description: Send a test webhook to ensure all integrations are working correctly.
